span.span: The source of the event, an .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派控制項，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create an delegate for an control, you identify the method that handles the event. 產生項目事件時，控制項告知處理常式。The control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
